headline.main: ROOSEVELT TARGET OF ITALIAN ATTACKS; ' Very Vulgar Blackguard in the White House' Assailed on Neutrality Repeal

lead_paragraph: ROME, Oct. 23 -- The efforts of President Roosevelt and Secretary of State Cordell Hull to get the Neutrality Act revised resulted today in some truly vicious personal attacks in the Italian press.
abstract: Ital Govt reaction to Gayda comment
snippet: ROME, Oct. 23 -- The efforts of President Roosevelt and Secretary of State Cordell Hull to get the Neutrality Act revised resulted today in some truly vicious personal attacks in the Italian press....
